snippet: At least 26 people at a crossing in Mpumalanga after a truck driver, who was trying to cross train tracks, miscalculated the speed of the approaching train.
abstract: Cargo train collides with a truck in Mpumalanga, South Africa, killing at least 26 people and injuring more than 25 others.
lead_paragraph: At least 26 people at a crossing in Mpumalanga after a truck driver, who was trying to cross train tracks, miscalculated the speed of the approaching train.

headline.main: South Africa: Collision Kills at Least 26
headline.print_headline: South Africa: Collision Kills at Least 26
